theoryText: Some fans theorized that Law's appearance on Punk Hazard and his Shichibukai status were part of a larger plan to take down a Yonko, specifically Doflamingo. His alliance with Luffy was seen as calculated rather than coincidental.
author: One Piece Community (2013)

theoryText: When Law switched Smoker and Tashigi's hearts in Episode 588, some fans theorized this could have permanent consequences or that Law might use this technique strategically in future battles. There was speculation about whether the switch could be reversed and if prolonged switching would have psychological effects.
author: Anime Forum Discussion (2013)

theoryText: Fans theorized that Law removing Smoker's heart would create a hostage situation where Law could use the heart to control or threaten Smoker throughout the arc, potentially forcing the Vice Admiral to cooperate or stand down.
author: One Piece Discussion Community

theoryText: Upon seeing Kin'emon's Fuku Fuku no Mi ability in Episode 588, fans theorized about its limitations and potential applications. Some speculated that the clothing might be able to grant special properties (fire resistance, etc.) or that it could be used for elaborate disguises that would be important later in the story.
author: One Piece Theory Community
